asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/dexas-turbo-fan-expandable-collapsible-salad-spinner/1041555088
The Turbo Fan Salad Spinner is a great prep tool for all your leafy greens. Unique multi-blade design creates maximum airflow and centrifugal force to rinse and dry your food. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: This is the deck says turbofan collapsible salad spinner from bed bath and beyond. Enjoy a crisp fresh clean salads and veggies with this convenient salad spinner. Unlike other salad spinners the deck says turbofan finner uses a multi blade fan and centrifugal force to remove water and dry fresh greens and vegetables. The non-skid base provides added stability while in use and the spinner boasts a generous 4 and 1/2 port capacity. The spinner works quickly to remove water and features a convenient push button break to stop the spinning action. The unit is easy to take apart and clean. And the bowl and basket are top brass dishwasher safe. Unlike most bulky salad spinner's this one collapses to five inches for easy space saving storage. And when you're ready to use it quickly it easily expands to full size. The deck says turbofan collapsible salad spinner available at bed bath and beyond near you.
